citations.narrative:
On October 30, 2022, a lab member found a single hamster dead in it's cage. The lab member noticed that the cage was
not lached in, as it should have been, which resulted in the cage moving forward and disconnecting from the air supply.
Failure to insure that cages are lached in and properly conected to prevent movement and maintain connection to life
support systems can result in harm to the animal or death. The registrant will insure that going forward all staff members
are aware of the importance of properly securing cages to prevent unintended movement and to insure their connection to
life support systems.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.38(f)(1)  Critical
   
Miscellaneous. 
On October 30, 2022, a lab member found a single hamster dead in it's cage. The lab member noticed that the cage was 
not lached in, as it should have been, which resulted in the cage moving forward and disconnecting from the air supply. 
Failure to insure that cages are lached in and properly conected to prevent movement and maintain connection to life 
support systems can result in harm to the animal or death. The registrant will insure that going forward all staff members 
are aware of the importance of properly securing cages to prevent unintended movement and to insure their connection to 
life support systems. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
